item.title: Know Bash Better
item.description: Run a history command ![line-num-from-history] Run any command as like as last time ![e.g. !vim] would open the same file/directory you did last time. Perform previous action as root sudo !! Search through history commands Control+R Control+C to cancel Search grep “text” filename tldr : tldr is useful find. -Cheat
